author: Taylor Hatmaker
title: People who mostly get news from social networks have some COVID-19 misconceptions
description: A new survey conducted by the Pew Research Center shows a COVID-19 information divide between people who mostly get their news from social networks and those who rely on more traditional news sources. Pew surveyed 8,914 adults in the U.S. during the week of M…
content:
A new survey conducted by the Pew Research Center shows a COVID-19 information divide between people who mostly get their news from social networks and those who rely on more traditional news sources.
Pew surveyed 8,914 adults in the U.S. during the week of … [+1418 chars]
